markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Fish](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=235)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 99</row>

Swimming in vast shoals through open ocean underneath the sparkling sun, lurking deep in the muddy beds of rivers, or schooling in pristine lakes, fish are found nearly anywhere there is water.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Piranha Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1155) (Creature 3), [Pufferfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1154) (Creature -1)
name: Fish
